identity.origin: Bone-ash core, bound in silence and grief.
identity.bound_bias: Echo-favored; mortal flesh is resisted unless overcharged.

passive.name: Ringing Fall
passive.description: Each hit leaves a low, lingering ring; courage wavers, stone remembers.

active.name: Kin Crack
active.description: Feed echoes to overcharge the head; the maul may take your hands if your mind slips.

ritual.name: Ritual Break
ritual.effect: Silences the ring forever; removes intimidation and echo-bias. Loses uniqueness.
ritual.notes: Say the true name aloud, once. The maul quiets and becomes a masterwork but mundane maul.

thresholds.description: Play the runes back like a broken music box; pain fuels the body.

thresholds.effect: The haft runes creep under skin; cannot be disarmed by mundane means.
thresholds.side_effect: Vendors refuse routine work; requires relic-smith to alter.

vs_echoes.notes: Baseline bias even without Kin Crack.

vs_mortals.notes: Human flesh tends to bounce unless overcharged or on criticals.
